folder: Poillon Avenue & Hylan Boulevard, Staten Island, NY
text:
Poillon Avenue (right, not seen), east side, south from near Hylan Boulevard toward Raritan Bay. Near the shore is an old house, probably the Seguine house on Butler's 1853 map and the Poillon house on Beers's 1874 map. The second photograph shows
an exclusive view of the house.
August 27, 1930
Views 1 and 2.
P.L.Sperr
